title: Illaoi Problems
body:
Hey guys,
I recently played vs Illaoi {{champion:420}} and came across 2 strange things.
I got hit by her E ability through a minion.

https://puu.sh/wLmLq/7d22616875.png

When one of her E spawned a tentacle which then started to wind up the q animation but there was no indicatior at the ground on where the skill was going thus no chance of dodging.

https://puu.sh/wLmLH/3186209ed0.png

On the first thing im not quite sure if that is actually a bug it could also be some weird interaction between riven e and her e 
but even then the clone from her e is still behind at least 1 minion in line of the skillshot.

And for people who complain about the second one saying its just a texture thing it is not i found it being very inconsistent because sometimes i could see it and sometimes I couldnt though I always saw it when she actually casted q herself.

Hope this actually gets some recognition.
